name: Tales of Cubonia: The 100 Days War
name_original: Tales of Cubonia: The 100 Days War
description:
A cube planet stands on the brink of war, engineered by the hands of a mysterious maniac. The only hope Cubonia has of avoiding full-scale war is seven unlikely heroes tasked with solving the mystery of the kidnapped prince and princess before it's too late. Fight monsters, explore the Cubonian countryside, and eat your weight in sticky buns.

Tales of Cubonia: The 100 Days War: an RPG in the style of the classics, with a healthy dose of humor.
